references.paper_title: Inverting layers of a large generator
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for inverting layers of a large generator, a key technique used in the target paper's one-step inversion framework.

references.paper_title: SwiftBrush v2: Make your one-step diffusion model better than its teacher
references.reason: SwiftBrushv2 is the one-step text-to-image model leveraged in the target paper, forming the backbone of both the one-step inversion network and the editing tool.

references.paper_title: TurboEdit: Text-based image editing using few-step diffusion models
references.reason: This paper explores few-step diffusion models for text-guided image editing, which the target paper builds upon to achieve one-step editing.

references.paper_title: Null-text inversion for editing real images using guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the null-text inversion method, a key technique that the target paper improves on to enable one-step inversion.

references.paper_title: Pnp inversion: Boosting diffusion-based editing with 3 lines of code
references.reason: This paper introduces a plug-and-play inversion method that is compared to the target paper's method in terms of speed and efficiency.
